content: this pattern is available as a free ravelry download aurora is the textured crochet design this pattern is the written instructions using u s /american terminology сharts and video tutorials you will need to work front and back post stitches clusters splits puffs popcorns all abbreviations and special stitches are explained in detail the pattern consists of 21 rounds you can use 2 or more contrasting colors total yardage for pattern between 150 200 yards using recommended thread and crochet hook #1 5 mm the finished size of the doily - approx 9 inches english translation provided by svetlana vyugova special thanks for english testing to linda keene o brien beth kelley fielding darla dale ying shaw anita aeshah
